ingredients.content: 500 g chicken breasts, skinless, cut in pieces (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place hazelnuts in mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic, onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>7 min/120°C/speed 2<b>.
Add chicken, white wine, water, stock cube, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/120°C/speed <b>.
Add honey and reserved ground hazelnuts then cook <b>3 min/120°C//speed <b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve immediately with your choice of sides.
